Context: The George Brown College Library made changes to their LLC Laptop Loan Policy on December 18, 2023. The college acknowledges systemic racism and is focused on addressing and improving community inclusivity for racialized students and employees. They are committed to taking actions such as reviewing and revising subject headings describing Indigenous topics, exploring options with database providers to remove or flag offensive content, and addressing harmful and offensive content in their collection. Students, staff, and faculty are encouraged to evaluate resources critically and report any offensive content they encounter. The contact information for the library is 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, and ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
